Sentencas: A thermally self-sustaining miniature power generation device was developed utilizing a single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) placed in a controlled thermal environment provided by a spiral counterflow Swiss roll heat exchanger and combustor.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: With the single-chamber design, fuel/oxygen crossover due to cracking of seals via thermal cycling is irrelevant and coking on the anode is practically eliminated.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Appropriate SOFC operating temperatures were maintained even at low Reynolds numbers (Re) via combustion of the fuel cell effluent at the center of the Swiss roll.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Both propane and higher hydrocarbon fuels were examined.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Extinction limits and thermal behavior of the integrated system were determined in equivalence ratio-Re parameter space and an optimal regime for SOFC operation were identified.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: SOFC power densities up to 420 mW/cm(2) were observed at low Re.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: These results suggest that single-chamber SOFCs integrated with heat-recirculating combustors may be a viable approach for small-scale power generation devices.
Titulo: A Thermally Self-Sustaining Miniature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
